label.phrase: our results show that at least for urinary tract infections cranberry juice targets the right bacteria those that cause disease but has no effect on non-pathogenic organisms suggesting that cranberry juice will not disrupt bacteria that are part of the normal flora in the gut

clusterList.phrase: our results show that at least for urinary tract infections cranberry juice targets the right bacteria those that cause disease but has no effect on non-pathogenic organisms suggesting that cranberry juice will not disrupt bacteria that are part of the normal flora in the gut
we have also shown that this effect occurs at concentrations of cranberry juice that are comparable to levels we would expect to find in the urinary tract
this suggests that to realize the antibacterial benefits of cranberry one must consume cranberry juice regularly perhaps daily
what i need to know about urinary tract infections
